search_05_002/4301_1001_0100_10: There you are, Torchic! Oh, thank goodness.
search_05_002/4301_1001_0200_10:
This cute li’l Torchic belong to you, dollface?
It came runnin’ outta nowhere...
Bumped right into my leg.
search_05_002/4301_1001_0300_10:
Eeeek! Y-yes, he’s my p-partner! S-sorry, mister!
I’m sure T-Torchic didn’t mean to run into you!
It was an a-accident!
search_05_002/4301_1001_0400_10:
What do you look so scared for, huh?
It’s fine! I ain’t even mad about it!
search_05_002/4301_0101_0100_10:
If you wanna be a Trainer, you gotta stand up
’n’ fight—no matter how strong your opponent
looks! C’mon, yo! You can start with me!
search_05_002/4301_0401_0500_10:
Hah! Your friend in the hat’s got the right idea!
C’mon! Don’t hold back—I ain’t gonna go easy
on you!
search_05_002/4301_0402_0800_10:
Hah! Your friend in the hat’s got the right idea!
C’mon! Don’t hold back—I ain’t gonna go easy
on you!
search_05_002/4301_0501_0100_10:
Whew! Your friend ’n’ [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] Pokémon are beasts,
dollface! You should buck up ’n’ learn somethin’
from ’em while you can. You got this!
search_05_002/4301_0501_0300_10:
He’s totally right. You two are sooo strong,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_05_002/4301_0501_0400_10:
You and your partner are so in sync with each
other. I wish we could be like that, too!
search_05_002/4301_0501_0500_10:
Right, Torchic? Do you want to be like
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and...
search_05_002/4301_0501_0700_10:
Ah! There you are! What are you doing all the
way over there?!
